title: Microsoft Virtual PC 2007 Portable (FBB)
description:
Microsoft Virtual Machine 2007


NOT Portabled by me and yes its for real! Take your whole OS/OS's where ever you go !

This is one I 'found' , over a year ago. It works great.

This one has 2 Folders with it that need to be kept with the exe, so all 3 should be in the same Folder

Virtual HDs are kept in .AppdataVirtual Machines.

Create a 'Dynamic' HD if your using a USB HD, thus using only the space necessary.

You can have a whole PC ( or a few dual booting) on a USB Key or HD (if you have the space). 

Great for Testing games(limited graphics though) / Thinstalling : though watch your memory as everything will be loading into Mem lol! 



No Viruses , No Trojans , No Malware and always tested .

 <a href="
http://www.microsoft.com/windows/downloads/virtualpc/default.mspx" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.microsoft.com/windows/downloads/virtualpc/default.mspx</a>



FightingBigbrother
